label: Musical Instruments
description: Products and services related to musical instruments.

subcategories.label: Guitars
subcategories.description: Stringed instruments with a long fretted neck and a flat back.

subcategories.label: Keyboards
subcategories.description: Musical instruments with a row of keys that produce sound.

subcategories.label: Drums
subcategories.description: Percussion instruments played by striking a membrane.

subcategories.label: Wind Instruments
subcategories.description: Musical instruments that produce sound by blowing air through a tube.

subcategories.label: Other Instruments
subcategories.description: Musical instruments that don't fit into other categories.
